nodes.text: Claing juice was a strong, red-colored alcoholic beverage made from fermented claing bush berries, native to the satellite-moon Nierport VII.
For the uninitiated, as was the case with Obi-Wan Kenobi, it could sear the lips and tongue and "burn like blazing fire" as it was imbibed, causing the eyes to involuntarily flow with tears.
